segments.text: Excuse me , sir , the toilet in my room doesn't flush .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am sorry , sir . Can you tell me your room number ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is there anything else I can do for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The tap is always driving . I can't sleep well .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , we will send a repairman to your room right now .
segments.speaker: S2
